title: PREVIEW: Current TV host and fmr. Michigan Gov. Jennifer Granholm says Romney is 'pandering' on auto bailouts position
paragraphs: Tuesday on Starting Point, Soledad has an interview with former Michigan Governor Jennifer Granholm, who is now the host of Current TV’s “The War Room with Jennifer Granholm.”
Soledad asks Gov. Granholm if 2012 GOP presidential candidate Mitt Romney’s position on the auto bailouts in the past will haunt him in Tuesday’s primary. See a clip from the interview here.
For the full interview, watch Starting Point on CNN Tuesday at 7am Eastern.
